name: RETRO INVASION (itch) (Wulfe, sMtt, euruxia)
description:
Face monsters from games of the past in this roguelike deckbuilder!

In the year 2100, Nintundu has just released it's final game, RETRO INVASION. People from all over the world is hyped about the game. The cartridge shape can adjust its shape to be compatible with all types of Nintendo consoles. Players can choose what game genre they want to play to complete the game. But unexpectedly, the game brings chaos to the real world. Monsters come out of the game console and attack the environment around the player.

One such player has chosen the card game genre as his weapon and used Nintendo's first console to play RETRO INVASION. Unexpectedly, the player unlocked the hidden feature of the game. Because of that, now his strength is not limited by the system and can grow stronger over time. And this is the beginning of the player's story to conquer the game.

Build your deck and overcome the monsters that have appeared from inside the game!

CREDITS

NameRoleGede BramantaGame Artist and Story WriterSean MatthewGame ProgrammerWilson NathanielGame Designer

[This game is made for Joints Game Jam 2023 by Team GWS]
